title: Hossein Bahrami
text:
Hossein Bahrami (born 1995) () is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Siah%20Jamegan%20F.C.">Siah Jamegan</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>.
Club career.
Bahrami joined <a href="Esteghlal%20Ahvaz">Esteghlal Ahvaz</a> in summer 2014. He made his professional debut against <a href="Esteghlal%20F.C.">Esteghlal</a> on August 21, 2015 as a starter. Bahrami joined <a href="Esteghlal%20Khuzestan%20F.C.">Esteghlal Khuzestan</a> in the summer of 2016 after Esteghlal Ahvaz was relegated from the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>.
